text: Martin Knight (born 17 October 1957) is a British rower. He competed in the men's coxless four event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:British male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Great Britain Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers from Greater London
title: Martin Knight (rower)
